I20060926-0935 + ZRH-plugins from 20060927_1520

I was on Preferences > General > Editors > Text Editors > Annotations, enabled Vertical Ruler for Spelling Errors, and pressed Apply.
I could not reproduce in another workspace.

Yes, but I did not restart so far. I've started in debug mode and can connect a debugger to the running Eclipse if necessary to find the problem.
I could not reproduce anymore after restart. Was probably due to bug 158791 or a third-party HTML editor I was using. I'll keep an eye on it to see whether it happens again.
